HelpXML.Title: brushRES
HelpXML.Purpose: brushRES displays a GUI which enables brushing in resfwdplot
HelpXML.Description: brushRES displays a GUI where it is possible to brush steps from the monitoring residuals plot and to see the corresponding units highlighted in other plots

Item.Name: eventdata
Item.TypeInd: Automatic code execution without user interaction
Item.LongDesc: This option enables to perform in an automatic way the code associated with a particular radiobutton in the GUI
Item.Example: 2 (the example associated with the second radiobutton will be automatically executed)

References.Item: Tufte E.R. (1983). The visual display of quantitative information. Graphics Press, Cheshire

Item.Title: Interactive example 1. Display a GUI where it is possible to brush steps from the monitoring residuals plot and to see the corresponding units highlighted in other plots.
Run examples associated with radiobuttons 1 to 6.
Run the example associated with radiobutton 2.
